title: With the Russians gone, a Ukrainian who had resisted emerges from the shadows.
dc:creator: Marc Santora and Anna Lukinova

media:content.media:credit: Lynsey Addario for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Civilians and soldiers in Blahodatne, Ukraine, less than 20 miles from the newly liberated city of Kherson, celebrating on Saturday.
